11.title: Mother and Son

12.content: Who will the unfortunate pair transform into?
12.title: Father and Son

choices: Both stay separate as the changes begin
123.content:
"Now be good boys, and try to get along?" Kyle’s mom, Laura, teased as her and her daughter Cindy were heading out the door to visit grandma.

"Yeah, yeah." Eighteen-year-old Kyle said with a dismissive tone. Next to him was his father Ron, a tall, decently fit 45-year-old man. The two often butted heads and rarely got along, despite being very close before.

"We'll be back tomorrow morning. If you're looking for a snack, there's still lots of food from that Goofy themed birthday party we had on Wednesday. Just try not to eat too much of it or your teeth will fall out."

"And you'll get fat," Cindy snarked.

Laura rolled her eyes with a sarcastic laugh before steering her bratty daughter out through the front door. "Bye, love you!" She said to her husband and son as Ron and Kyle waved before the door closed between them. Almost instantly Kyle turned heel and jogged upstairs.

Ron turned to his son with a look of befuddlement. "Hey Kyle, where ya going? Didn't you wanna watch some tv?"

"Nah Ron, I’m alright, gotta do some homework." said Kyle as he went upstairs.

"Alright... just... just keep the volume down..." Ron said from the base of the stairs. Ron was also about to chastise his son for calling him by his first name, which he always felt was a sign of disrespect with its callous casual nature, but froze up. He then heard the door to his son's room slam shut. He winced and shook his head with a sigh. "I'll never understand that kid…"

Once in his room, Ron snatched his brand new laptop, pressed the "on" button of his PS4, and sat on a ratty old beanbag chair that was pushed up against the foot of his bed. It was ripped and matted from years of use, not to mention it carried a somewhat pungent odor from its overuse.

Kyle opened his laptop and surfed the web while he waited for the game console to fully power on. Looking over his emails and Facebook, with an occasional glimpse at a more "private" folder, he couldn’t help but let out a massive yawn. Truth was he was bored out of his skull and the idea of being stuck with his dad for the next few days annoyed him.

Truth be told he was hoping his father would have gone with his mother and sister so he could head over to his friends house and sleep there. Especially since his friend’s smoking hot college freshman sister was in town for the weekend, with her beautiful curves, perky rear, beautiful eyes....hot ziggity, she was good looking!

Kyle grinned as he fantasized about the girl, his cheeks slowly changing to a deep crimson when he heard a “bloop” and realized his console was now fully on. Shaking himself free of his fantasy, he begrudgingly entered reality and began a round of "Call of Duty." Leaning back against the beanbag chair, he let out a deep, long sigh.

“Let the fun begin,” he muttered under his breath as he fired a few rounds from his virtual weapon.

An hour passed of sports on TV, and Ron began to wonder what went wrong between him and Kyle. When he was younger they were inseparable, and now he cant stand him.

He sighed, "What happened? We used to be so close. Maybe again, someday.." thought Ron to himself.

Meanwhile upstairs, after his fifth straight win, Kyle found himself even more bored than when he started playing. As he exited his bedroom and crossed the top of the stairs to get to bathroom he looked downstairs to catch the slightest glimpse of his looking father sitting in the armchair, watching tv alone. Part of him started to feel bad.

"Man he looks lonely. I just wish he wasn’t such a hard ass all the time." Kyle fondly remember his youth and opes one day to return to that. Suddenly a wave of tingliness runs down Kyle's body.

"Whoah," Kyle shuddered. "That was weird. What was that?”

Suddenly Ron feels a tingle run down his body too. After some silence and contemplation, he shrugs and is about to get back to watching television when he hears a loud, low, deep growl come from his modest, middle-aged paunch.
123.title: Peg and Pete

1231.content:
At this point Kyle walks over slowly as Ron is examining his belly, confused by the sudden crassness of its sounds.

“Hey son, you hungry? I need to eat something quick,” Ron says before standing up and making his way towards the kitchen.

"sure, im kind of hungry. but your stomach sounds like a concert!" says Kyle.

"yeah i dont know, I had a decent breakfast. Oh well, good thing we got lots of left over pizza!" Said ron as he opened up the fridge and took out 6 boxes of extra large pizzas.

"wow thats of pizza." said kyle, suddenly realizing hes thirsty. "do we have anything to drink?"

"hmm, we have quite a few of these Goofy themed sodas from the birthday party," said Ron as he pulled out a few 2 liter bottles of soda. There were different flavors, one that goofy on the label and was "guh-horange", one with Pete that was "big bellied root beer", and one that had peg that was "voluptous strawberry".

"which one did you want kyle?"
1231.title: Kyle goes over to Ron

choices: The men slowly transform into their forms
12313.content:
“Hm…. well I’ve been craving Strawberry for a while,” Kyle swiped the bottle that donned the image of the toony milf.

Ron, meanwhile, didn’t even hesitate to snag the root beer with Pete on the label. Both father and son looked at each other. Ron shrugged and raised the bottle, “Bottoms up.” He said before popping the cap off and starting to chug the beverage.

Kyle paused for a moment before he followed suit and opened up his own bottle and started to drink it.

Both father and son kept chugging. For some reason the drinks were extremely addictive, like some kind of wonderful drug, and they couldn’t seem to break away from it. They had to have it, even as the fizz began to accumulate in their bellies so by the time both bottles were emptied, Ron and Kyle’s stomachs were gurgling even louder and felt bloated and gassy.

“Hm…. well I’ve been craving Strawberry for a while,” Kyle swiped the bottle that donned the image of the toony milf.

Ron, meanwhile, didn’t even hesitate to snag the root beer with Pete on the label. Both father and son looked at each other. Ron shrugged and raised the bottle, “Bottoms up.” He said before popping the cap off and starting to chug the beverage.

Kyle paused for a moment before he followed suit and opened up his own bottle and started to drink it.

Both father and son kept chugging. For some reason the drinks were extremely addictive, like some kind of wonderful drug, and they couldn’t seem to break away from it. They had to have it, even as the fizz began to accumulate in their bellies so by the time both bottles were emptied, Ron and Kyle’s stomachs were gurgling even louder and felt bloated and gassy.

Ron's apetite was in full force, devouring pizza box after pizza pox, as kyle had a few slices.

"geez dad, that was supposed to last us a while!"

"what can I say, a mans gotta eat!" Said Ron unapolagetically, on his 12 slice of pizza.

"BRRRRRRR" Kyle's stomach gurgled. "ugghh I dont feel so good..."

Suddenly Kyle noticed his dad was growing black fur!

"Dad! somethings happening to you!

"huh?" Ron stopped, not noticing what Kyle was looking at. "Happening to me? Look what's happening to you!"

"Huh?"
12313.title: Peg Strawberry

choices: Kyle... continues transforming into a GILF Peg!
123131.content:
Kyle looked down just in time to see that he was growing taller. Not only that, but his hips and rump seemed to be swelling up a bit as his hair started to turn orange.

He reached up to touch the hair as he noticed the hair on his arms began to retract, leaving his skin smooth.

“Gah! What’s going on?” Kyle asked in a panic.

Ron was intrigued by Kyles changes, but quickly felt his pants and shirt getting tighter and tighter.

"phew, should probably loosen up.." said Ron calmly as he undid his belt and pants, while his torso inflated, the black fur now covering his entire body except for his face. "Whoah, I have fur? this is really weird.."

"Dad, how are you so calm about this?" the terrified Kyle berated his father, wincing in pain as his waist convulsed and shrank, become tiny and taut, as his ass and thighs ballooned beyond any realistic size, destroying his mens jeans. He could feel the swelling fat of his growing plump ass lifting him in his chair.

"Dad! Help me!" He whimpered, his voice cracking and growing higher.

Ron watches his son in silent awe… as the term “son” started to apply to him less and less. Kyle grew a little bit taller as his hair grew longer and puffed out. His nose inflated a bit and his face pushed out into a small muzzle as his eyelashes lengthened.

Ron, meanwhile, heard more growls coming from his stomach. He covered his mouth as he let out a small burp only to see his hand growing thicker… meatier. Not only that, but something was materializing around his hands…. white, plus gloves encased them. He started as he felt his own face grow a bit, his nose turning dark and his chin filling with fat so much it started to become double.

He also couldn’t help but notice his sense of smell improve with his changed nose. Sniffing the air he caught whiff both of his increasingly musky, smelly scent (whoever he was becoming clearly preferred to stew in his own sweat rather than shower) and his son’s increasingly feminine scent.

Kyle, still in pain, stopped paying attention to his own changes as his father's transformation began to slow down and end, realizing who he had become. Looking at his father's massively obese frame, his features cat like, his massive under bite with 2 buck teeth protruding out.

"oh god... DAD! youre- youre- youre PETE!" Kyle pointed to the empty soda bottle with petes face. Ron examined his new body calmly. "wow, incredible, I am pete!" he said in his new gruff voice.

"then that means... oh god.." Kyle glanced at the soda he drank, with Peg's face on the label. The bloating in his stomach intensified as he felt even more changes coming. "oh god!"
123131.title: The men slowly transform into their forms

124.content: Who else could they become?

1243.content:
How about....

1. They stumble into a nearby hollow tree where they find themselves in wonderland and slowly become the new king and queen of hearts.

or

1243.title: Other

choices: Pete and Mike find themselves in front of a castle.
Pete finds himself in a strange forest separated from Mike.
12431.content:
"What did I tell ya Pete? Nothing like the great outdoors." Said Mike as he began unloading the trunk of the car.

"Yeah, yeah" Said Pete.

Pete was your typical 21 year old slacker. despite his lazy attitude, he had a slim figure with short black hair. Mike was his 56 year old divorcee father who reckoned a father son outing to his summer home in the country might rekindle some bonding time. Mike was an outgoing kind of guy that still kept in shape and he enjoyment in walking and labor work showed it. Not being around Pete while he was growing up put a strain in their relationship, so he thought this trip might help them spend some time together. Mike is aware that he'll have to put in the effort due to Pete's lack of interest.

While Mike was bringing in all there gear into the house, Pete just laid on the couch listening to his Ipod.

"Well, that's the last of the stuff so, why not have a wonder around the area to familiarize yourself. It'll be while before we eat." Suggested Mike.

Reluctant at first, Pete got up and quietly making his way outside which he then closed the door silently.

Pete didn't really go that far, he just went a few feet away from the house before settling down under a huge tree. Resting under it, he hope the time will past quickly and this trip will be over before he knew it. He soon pretty much out like a light.


Hours later, Mike went outside to fetch him, as Pete didn't return as expected. Seeing his son in the distance, he went over and nudged him a few times with no response.

"Come on Pete. Up you go. We'll have a blast bonding. I promise" He said trying to pull him up by the arm.

Suddenly, a hole in the tree started to opening up causing Pete who was still leaning back to tumble backwards down the hole. Mike, still in the momentum of pulling his son up was caught in the tumble and went down the mysterious hole.

Feeling no gravity around him, Pete opened his eyes to see himself and his dad falling down a black void.

"AHHH, what the hell?!" He screamed.

And like that, he was out like a light again.
12431.title: Down the hollow tree

125.title: Or does only one person transform?

info.brief_description: 2 family members are changed forever as they shockingly transform into husband and wife!
info.description:
Two family members lives and relationships are changed forever as they are each transformed into different bodies and matched as a loving married couple!

Will it be a forced arrangement, will be initiated by the other person, or will it be a willing transformation?

WARNING: Contains incest or incestuous themes.

Rules:

-No sex with any characters physically under 18 years old
-No scat
-No additions less than 3 sentences. Choice chapters are fine but please no abusing them.
